abstract: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York has been examining major financial firms’ exposure to BP to ensure that if the oil giant buckles under the costs of the Gulf oil spill, it won’t put Wall Street or the global financial system at risk.
snippet: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York has been examining major financial firms’ exposure to BP to ensure that if the oil giant buckles under the costs of the Gulf oil spill, it won’t put Wall Street or the global financial system at risk.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve Bank of New York has been examining major financial firms’ exposure to BP to ensure that if the oil giant buckles under the costs of the gulf oil spill, it won’t put Wall Street or the global financial system at risk, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.

headline.main: N.Y. Fed Examines Wall Street Exposure to BP

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Reserve Bank of New York
